content:
What a great idea! Podcasts are a perfect companion for lunch breaks. Considering your interest in "The Daily Boost" and "How I Built This", I think the following podcasts from my previous recommendations would be an excellent fit for your lunch breaks:

**Top Picks for Lunch Breaks**

1. **The 5 AM Miracle Podcast**: Short, daily episodes (20-30 minutes) that will give you a motivational boost to tackle the rest of your day.
2. **The Tiny Leaps Podcast**: Daily episodes (20-30 minutes) focused on making small, incremental changes to improve your life. Perfect for a lunch break pick-me-up!
3. **The School of Greatness with Lewis Howes**: Episodes are around 30-45 minutes, but you can easily fit in a half-hour episode during your lunch break. Lewis's energy and inspiring conversations will get you pumped up for the rest of the day.
4. **The Chris Brogan Show**: Chris's episodes are usually around 20-40 minutes, making them a great fit for a lunch break. He shares valuable insights on business, marketing, and personal growth.

These podcasts are all engaging, informative, and will leave you feeling inspired and motivated to tackle the rest of your day. You can easily listen to an episode during your lunch break and still have time to grab a bite and relax before heading back to work.

If you want to explore more, you can also consider:

* **The Happiness Lab with Dr. Laurie Santos**: Episodes are around 20-30 minutes, and the podcast is all about exploring the science behind happiness and well-being.
* **The James Altucher Show**: While episodes can be longer (30-60 minutes), James's conversations are always thought-provoking and inspiring.

Enjoy your lunch break podcasts!
